metadata.title: Gilani vows to uphold Zulfikar Ali BhuttoÃ¢ÂÂs mission of public service

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 05 (APP):On Sunday, Senate Chairman Yousaf Raza Gilani paid tribute to Shaheed Zulfikar Ali Bhutto on his birth anniversary, pledging to continue his public service mission. aZulfikar Ali Bhuttoas political philosophy continues to guide us,a said Gilani, adding that Bhutto was a visionary leader who still holds a special place in the peopleas hearts. In his message Gilani highlighted the late leaderas vision of empowering the masses, describing him as a champion of democracy who declared the people as the true source of power. aHis pro-worker and pro-poor policies made him the most popular leader of his time,a Gilani remarked. The Senate Chairman acknowledged Bhuttoas relentless struggle against exploitative forces and credited him with giving Pakistan its Constitution and empowering marginalized communities. aZulfikar Ali Bhutto gave Pakistan a distinct identity on the global stage and laid the foundation for the country to become a nuclear power,a Gilani stated. He also emphasized Bhuttoas role in introducing democratic values and traditions, noting that his legacy of service and sacrifice inspires the nation. Concluding his message, Gilani reaffirmed his commitment to upholding Bhuttoas ideals and continuing efforts for the betterment of the people, guided by his vision.
content.summary: Senate Chairman Yousaf Raza Gilani paid tribute to Zulfikar Ali Bhutto on his birth anniversary, vowing to continue his public service mission. Gilani highlighted Bhutto's vision of empowering the masses and his contributions to Pakistan's identity and nuclear program.
